isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - SINGLE REDUCTION, SINGLE SPEED AXLES: SPICER D135-S, F155-S, F170-S SERIES - SERVICE PROCEDURES - REBUILD FACILITIES

svcproc.title: REBUILD FACILITIES
svcproc.para:
A suitable holding fixture or carrier overhaul stand is desirable (refer to SPECIAL TOOLS
), but not necessary to rebuild these units. Alternately, a sturdy shop table of approximately 30 inches in height can be used with suitable means to hold the carrier securely for rebuild operations. A light chain hoist should be used to relocate the carrier housing and to install or remove the ring gear and support case assembly.
